column1: deacon oscar c. holloway| deacon oscar c. holloway age 89
column3: florida. passed away quietly on monday
column5: 2015 at treasure coast hospice following an extended illness. deacon holloway was a longtime residence of port st. lucie. he labored as a gardener for several years privately. he was a faithful member of mount calvary missionary baptist church serving as deacon. he leaves to mourn his passing his son
column9: and a host of many sorrowing relatives and friends. homegoing services will be held saturday
column11: 2015 at 1:00 p. m. at mount calvary missionary baptist church
column14: pastor. friends may call on friday
column16: 2015 from 5 - 7 p. m. at the church mentioned above.
